data.actual_result: The mini profile reopens unexpectedly. Depending on what you did at step 4, it may reopen anywhere: in  DMs, in DTesters, in your friends server, or even in your friend list!
data.expected_result: You should get back to chat in the same state as you left off
data.short_description: If you jump to a user's DM via his mini profile, minimizing and reopening Discord can reopen the mini profile anywhere in the app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel - Open someone's mini profile - Tap "Send a message" option on the mini profile to jump to his DM - (optional) Continue using Discord normally: switch channels, etc- Minimize Discord using Home button - Reopen Discord using the shortcut icon (not via multi-tasking)
